Dictionary of registered resampling strategies

Source: R/mlr_resamplings.R
mlr_resamplings.Rd

Dictionary of registered resampling strategies

Usage

See Dictionary.

See also

Other Dictionary: Dictionary, mlr_learners, mlr_measures, mlr_tasks

Other Resampling: Resampling

Examples

mlr_resamplings$keys()
#> [1] "bootstrap"   "custom"      "cv"          "holdout"     "repeated_cv"
#> [6] "subsampling"
as.data.table(mlr_resamplings)
#>             id     hyperpars default_iters
#> 1:   bootstrap repeats,ratio            30
#> 2:      custom                           0
#> 3:          cv         folds            10
#> 4:     holdout         ratio             1
#> 5: repeated_cv repeats,folds           100
#> 6: subsampling repeats,ratio            30
r = mlr_resamplings$get("cv")
print(r)
#> <ResamplingCV> with 10 iterations
#> Parameters: folds=10
#> 
#> Public: clone, has_duplicates, hash, id, instance, instantiate,
#>   is_instantiated, iters, par_set, par_vals, test_set, train_set
